channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Cook: 30
channel.desc: Chef Jeremy prepares a healthy selection of snacks: vegetable sticks with creamy basil hummus, mini corn and cilantro fritters with avocado salsa, crispy Italian bruschetta and an energizer smoothie.

channel.title: Body & Spirit
channel.desc: Healthy lifestyle information provided by Dick Nunez; a set of isotonic exercises.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Miracles in Motion
channel.desc: Raised Methodist and later becoming Catholic, Laura Sommerfield's life took a turn in 2016 when she stumbled upon 3ABN while recovering from surgery; she began to exploring the truths of the Bible.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Unshackled Purpose
channel.desc: Struggling with knowing one's worth; learning about the one who paid it all to be able to spend eternity with others.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Tiny Tots for Jesus
channel.desc: Music and farmers, animals and gardens, stories and fun for the little ones. With colorful sets and loveable characters.

channel.title: 3ABN Kids Camp Creation Crafts
channel.desc: Get creative and make beautiful reminders of God's Word with these unique crafts.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: 3ABN Today Bible Q&A
channel.desc: Many claim that the Bible is unreliable because it was written and altered by man; this is a notion the devil would be delighted for everyone to accept.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Evolution Impossible
channel.desc: Scientists recognize there is still a lot to be discovered in science.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: ASAP Ministries
channel.desc: Scott and Julia feature four missionaries in different Southeast Asian countries and the challenges and joys of their work.

channel.title: Prophecy Unsealed
channel.desc: Learning how to let go of bitterness and have joy again.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: 3ABN Sabbath School Panel
channel.desc: The host teams up with a panel of religious scholars to conduct various discussions that provide an in-depth analysis on the Bible and the life of Jesus Christ.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Behold the Lamb Presents
channel.desc: Balaam was not a part of Israel; he had been given the knowledge of God and was called to be God's mouthpiece-a prophet; but Balaam held on to one sin.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Ultimate Prescription
channel.desc: Dr. James Marcum on healing through the Creator; what no one says about healthcare.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Abundant Living
channel.desc: Curtis and Paula Eakins showcase the health benefits of sunlight while demonstrating how to prepare a pepper steak dish.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Action 4 Life
channel.desc: Healthy lifestyle information provided by Casio Jones; a variety of exercises with simple gym equipment; brief visits to health and fitness facilities.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: A Wolf in Sheep's Clothing
channel.desc: Delving deep into the life of Davie Garcia, a young man lured into the world of Wicca through the captivating sounds of Heavy Metal music; with an exploration into the biblical connection between music and spiritual influence, Davie recounts his turbulent journey from the allure of the occult to finding solace and salvation in Christ.

channel.title: 3ABN Today Bible Q&A
channel.desc: Many claim that the Bible is unreliable because it was written and altered by man; this is a notion the devil would be delighted for everyone to accept.

channel.title: 3ABN Kids Camp Kitchen Fun
channel.desc: Host Cinda Sanner prepares different recipes for the young campers to showcase their cooking skills in the kitchen.

channel.title: Tiny Tots Kitchen
channel.desc: Host Cinda Sanner teaches the children how to create fun recipes and cook healthy, delicious meals together.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Tiny Tots Worship
channel.desc: Cinda Sanner and Lecia Bromley help children learn about the teachings of Jesus and how to incorporate them in their lives.

channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: Sanctuary Salvation & Our Savior
channel.desc: The Ark of the Covenant and the Ten Commandments reveal God's plan of writing His law of love on the tablets of people's hearts.

channel.desc: The host, along with a panel of religious scholars, conduct various discussions to provide an in-depth insight into various topics from the Bible and the life of Jesus Christ.

channel.title: Spotless
